name: Michael M. Folkerts, C.Phil.
body:
### Physics
I earned my Bachelor's and Master's degrees in physics from the University of California San Diego (UCSD) where I am currently a Ph.D. candidate. My passion is applied science and my current focus is Medical Physics/Radiation Oncology research. Along the way I have dabbled in full-stack software development.

### Software
I've had exposure to a few popular languages like C/C++, Java, PHP, SQL, JavaScript, and Python (my favorite). Linked below are a few computational physics apps written in pure JavaScript.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
